amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1617 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 24. Record Vote Number: 119.

action.text: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1617 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 118.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 4106(a) of H. Con. Res. 71, 115th Congress, raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1617.
Cloture on amendment SA 1617 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 19. Record Vote Number: 117.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 1617 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 1617 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Gardner. (consideration: CR S2852) In the nature of a substitute.
